mapper.insert: insert into bas_organize_info (oname, ename, shortname, fullname, web, con_way, industry, scale, address, logo, stime, other, source, url, uuid, type, financing_info, financing_stage, company_nature, management_field, introduce, picture, development_history, corporate_culture, tag) values (#{oname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{web,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{financingInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financingStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managementField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{developmentHistory,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{corporateCulture,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id from bas_organize_info where uuid=#{uuid}
